channel.title: Delta staff zone
channel.description: my server doesnt have a staff zone -_-" i wanna know how to add a staff zone what have the putpet troso were u get the hallowean mask and party hats etc and a decent staff shop

item.title: Delta staff zone
item.dc:creator: @Killerswan Killerswan
item.description:
@Killerswan wrote:

Make an NPC then in client.java

poof:

 if(npcID == npctosendyoutostaffzone && playerRights >= 1) {
 talk("Welcome to the staff zone!", NPCID);
 toX = ####;
 toY = ####;

 } else if (!playerRights >= 1) {
  talk("This is a staff only teleport.", NPCID);
  break;
}

NOTE: the break may or may not be needed the break will just end the if statement in its tracks so the NPC wont saying anything more so fourth.

Read full topic
